00028 #include <rdkcore/object/object.h>
00029 #include <config.h>
00030 
00031 namespace RDK2 { namespace RGraphics {
00032 
00033 using namespace RDK2::Meta;
00034 
00035 #define FOURCC(a, b, c, d) ((a) | ((b) << 8) | ((c) << 16) | ((d) << 24))
00036 
00037 class RImage: public RDK2::Object {
00038 public:
00040     enum Type {
00041         RGB32 = FOURCC('R', 'G', 'B', '4'),
00042         RGB24 = FOURCC('R', 'G', 'B', '3'),
00043         GREY =  FOURCC('G', 'R', 'E', 'Y'),
00044         C8 =    FOURCC('R', 'D', 'K', 'M'),     
00045         JPEG =  FOURCC('J', 'P', 'E', 'G'), 
00046         YUYV =  FOURCC('Y', 'U', 'Y', 'V')
00047     };
00048 
00050     enum C8Color {
00051         C8Unset =   0,
00052         C8Black =   1,
00053         C8Blue =    2,
00054         C8Green =   4,
00055         C8Cyan =    8,
00056         C8Red =     16,
00057         C8Magenta = 32,
00058         C8White =   64,
00059         C8Grey =    128 };
00060     
00062     RImage();
00063     
00070     RImage(int w, int h, Type t, unsigned char* buf = 0);
00071 
00079     RImage(const RImage& img, int x0, int y0, int x1, int y1);
00080 
00082     virtual ~RImage();
00083 
00088     RImage(const RImage&);
00089 
00091     RImage& operator=(const RImage&);
00092 
00093 protected: 
00097     virtual void initBuffer(int width, int height, Type type, void* buf, unsigned char fillValue, bool freeOldBuffer = true);
00098 
00099 public:
00102     virtual RDK2::Object* clone() const;
00104 
00110     virtual void setSizeAndType(size_t w, size_t h, Type t);
00111 
00119     virtual void canvasResize(size_t w, size_t h, size_t x = 0, size_t y = 0, unsigned char fillValue = 0);
00120 
00124     virtual void fillBuffer(unsigned char fillValue);
00125 
00130     virtual void imageResize(size_t w, size_t h);
00131     
00135     inline size_t getWidth() const { return width; }
00136     
00138     inline size_t getHeight() const { return height; }
00139     
00141     inline Type getType() const { return type; }
00142     
00144     inline size_t getBufferSize() const { return bufferSize; }
00145 
00149     inline size_t getDataSize() const { return dataSize; }
00150     
00152     static size_t getBytesPerPixel(Type t);
00153     
00155     inline size_t getBytesPerPixel() { return bpp; }
00156     
00159     inline unsigned char* getBuffer() { return buffer; }
00160     inline const unsigned char* getBuffer() const { return buffer; }
00162 
00165     inline void setPixel(size_t x, size_t y, size_t component, unsigned char value) { rows[y][x * bpp + component] = value; }
00166     inline unsigned char getPixel(size_t x, size_t y, size_t component) const { return rows[y][x * bpp + component]; }
00167 
00172     inline bool safeSetPixel(size_t x, size_t y, size_t component, unsigned char value)
00173     { return (x < width && y < height ? setPixel(x, y, component, value), true : false); }
00174 
00179     inline unsigned char safeGetPixel(size_t x, size_t y, size_t component, unsigned char defaultValue) const
00180     { return (x < width && y < height ? getPixel(x, y, component) : defaultValue); }
00181 
00183 
00186     virtual bool knowsDiffs() { return true; }
00187     virtual bool applyDiff(const ObjectDiff* diff);
00188     virtual vector<ObjectDiff*> splitInDiffs(size_t maxSize);
00190 
00193     virtual void read(Reader* r) throw (ReadingException);
00194     virtual void write(Writer* w) const throw (WritingException);
00196     
00197 protected:
00203     void readImpl(Reader* r) throw (ReadingException);
00204 
00210     void writeImpl(Writer* w) const throw (WritingException);
00211 
00212 public:
00214     virtual RImage* convertTo(Type t) const;
00215 
00216 protected:
00219     virtual RImage* toRGB32() const;
00220     virtual RImage* toRGB24() const;
00221     virtual RImage* toGrey() const;
00222     virtual RImage* toC8() const;
00224 
00225 public:
00227     bool loadMagick(std::string filename, double occupied = 0.5, double equal = 0.1);
00228     bool saveMagick(std::string filename, bool trimImage = false);
00229 
00230 protected:
00234     size_t width;
00235 
00237     size_t height;
00238 
00240     Type type;
00241 
00243     size_t bpp;
00244     
00246     unsigned char* buffer;
00247 
00249     unsigned char** rows;
00250     
00252     size_t bufferSize;
00253     
00255     size_t dataSize;
00257 };
